div.p: The output is parsed and links are provided for additional functionality. Eg. when the pmd, checkstyle or announcement plugin's output is recognized one can click on the link to open the announcement in editor or open files that have pmd or checkstyle violations.

center.font: Screenshot 1Running a goal that generates a report will show a link in the output window.

div.p: If clicking on the violation link, the editor is opened for that particular file and all it's violations are marked in editor.

center.font: Screenshot 2A new output tab for report and annotations in the editor.
